title: Stunning & Spacious Convertible in Old Town! Contact us!
posting_body: Contact Us to Schedule a Tour!
This is a modern 32-story tower with stylish residences inspired by the neighborhood.
With unparalleled amenities and innovative services, this amazing place offers the best of everything.
The historic neighborhood of Old Town is located in the North Side of Chicago.
Its buildings date back to the Victorian era, but the pace is anything but old-fashioned.
Old Town is lively both day and night – residents enjoy the cool, eclectic shops as well as rustic taverns along Wells Street.
When you first step into the community, you’ll probably notice the iron “Old Town” sign.
You’ll also discover the diversity here, both in food and culture.
The comedy zone is a great place to go for a good laugh – check out the Second City or Zanies Comedy Club for weekly shows.
In addition to the eclectic shops along Wells Street, residents find comfort in the local market where they can purchase fragrant spices, imported oils, and blended wines.
Many family-owned restaurants reside here - from pizza parlors to steakhouses and sushi.
The building and apartments are all top notch.

The gym is great and has everything you need (weights, bench, squat racks, pelotons, rowing machines, treadmills, etc), the pool and outdoor decks are amazing, and the rooftop in tower 3 gives you the best views in the city.
It's also a very dog friendly building with a park in the building and a larger park right outside the building.
PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $2,257 / Month
Beds: 1
Bath: 1
Available Date: 08/28/2022
Pet: Pet Friendly
